text: May it please the Court, Mr. Chief Justice.
Is this a confession of error?
No, by no means, Your Honor.
You don't -- you don't -- you really are stating this thing, (Inaudible)
Yes, Your Honor I did, but in view of the questions from the bench, I thought it might be well to make it orally.
I understood you to say you confessed that the confession was coerced.
Within the meaning of the Due Process Clause, yes, that it was obtained by violation of the petitioner's constitutional rights under the Fourteenth Amendment.
